title: Pennsylvania Pension CIO Jim Grossman to Resign Amid Federal Probe
sub_head: The CIO lost confidence of some board members after a scandal over inaccurately reported investment returns and the investigation
body:
The investment chief of Pennsylvaniaâ€™s largest pension fund plans to announce his retirement on Thursday.
Jim Grossman, the chief investment officer, lost the confidence of some board members after a scandal over inaccurately reported investment returns and a federal investigation.
